alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 2:57PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Elbert and south central Arapahoe Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Arapahoe Park, or 22 miles southeast of Denver, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Aurora and eastern Parker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
